product_name: The North Face Isotherm Half-Zip Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Prepare for workouts in the cold in The North Face Isotherm Half-Zip Top for women. It uses a warm blend of merino wool and FlashDry(TM) fibers to help regulate your temperature. Blend of merino wool, polyolefin and polyester fabric wicks moisture, dries quickly and offers light insulation for the cold. Panels with wicking FlashDry fibers wrap around the sides, down the center back and under the arms for exceptional moisture management. Body-mapped construction provides lightweight warmth without sacrificing breathability. When your hands need light protection in chilly weather, pull the mitts out from the internal cuffs and over your fingers. Athlete tested and competition proven, The North Face Isotherm Half-Zip Top for women is part of the Flight Series(R) collection. Reflective logo; dropped hem. Closeout.
short_description: Prepare for workouts in the cold in The North Face Isotherm Half-Zip Top for women. It uses a warm blend of merino wool and FlashDry(TM) fibers to help regulate your temperature.
